reviewText:
I saw the movie, and so enjoyed the story, that I decided to purchase as a gift.
The title would not have informed you nor led you to believe that much of the scenery and story-visuals occurs on the island of Ischia (Bay of Naples), Italy. This was my late father-in-law's home of birth, and the opportunity to share the visuals of the Port and marina, and hillsides with my sister-in-law and bother-in-law is greatly appreciated by me, and will be for them as well.
